charges.charge_description: did knowingly and intentionally possess pseudoephedrine, a listed chemical, knowing or having reasonable cause to believe, that the pseudoephedrine will be used to manufacture methamphetamine, a schedule II controlled substance, in violation of title 21, USC, section 841(d)(2) and title 18 USC section 2
